text: The Africanis is a group of rare South African dogs. They are not recognized as a breed. The Swahili name for the breed is . This means common or mixed- breed or "traditional dog". ==Description== The Africanis is a medium-sized dog. It is well-muscled and is a bit longer than it is tall. It has a short coat of fur that can be of any color. This dog can run very fast and also is trainable. == References == * * Africanis Society of Southern Africa == Other websites == * University of Johannesburg (scientific study) * Breed standard (KUSA) Category:Mammals of Africa Category:Dog breeds
title: Africanis
